title: Isekai Cheat Survival Meshi: Tabete, Tsuyoku Natte, Mata Taberu
original_name: 異世界チートサバイバル飯 食べて、強くなって、また食べる
sinopse: Kazusa Yuu is a high school student who loves food and the outdoors. After getting hit by a car, he is sent to another world, where he gains the ability to acquire the power of whatever he eats.
